Topic.Title: Breacher Story - An interactive Narrative in Social Engineering.

Posts.EditableText:
Hi everyone,

a friend and I have completed our first text adventure game for the mobile market. You can find it on Google Play or on the App store. The game is called : Breacher Story. there is a free demo that lets you play 20% of the game. the game plays in real time and takes about 4  to 7 days to finish.

Here is the trailer I made for it : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EJrK2-VnrKE

Ian

Posts.EditableText:
I always wonder if some of the people who come there are just hosting their game here, and they used some other program, other than Squiffy or Quest!
It looks fantastic, anyway!

Every time I se "social engineering" in a game or something, either they don't use it at all, or they use very little of it.
I don't know what it means. I'll have to look it up.

"Social engineering is an attack vector that relies heavily on human interaction and often involves tricking people into breaking normal security procedures."
Oh.... so THAT'S what it means!
Carry on, then...

I thought it meant socially manipulating people by psychology or socialogy in general...
